channel.title: Distrelec Jira
channel.description: An XML representation of a search request

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7537] Segmentation Change
item.description:
The segmentation needs to be modified in the webshop to fit new SAP and Adito (CRM).

1. Modify the Registration form:
1.a Rename "Department" with "Area of use/Industry" (if too long, please let us know)
1.b New values for "Department" (see attached)
1.c New values for "Function" (see attached)

2. Modify the values already existing in Hybris regarding Department/Function, Workflow (given by René):
2.a create new values
2.b migration with impex, groovy or SQL
2.c remove old values

  • Sub ticket created for part 2: DISTRELEC-7672

The Change Needs to golive together at the same evening with SAP and Adito.

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Hi Nabil, please take care of part 1, thx.

1.b New values for "Department" (see attached)
1.c New values for "Function" (see attached)

what are the "Area of use/Industry" and "Function" codes used by SAP for these new values ?
Exactly Same Values. @Urs: Could you please confirm my statement thx.
I need the mapping between new names and existing codes. Thx

Hi Nabil
Attached the new values with the new SAP key.
According to our last discussion you do not store the values from the customers in Hybris (NEW SAP -> Hybris). At the point the customer logs in you get the values from NEW SAP.

Perhaps that is diffrent to old ELFA SAP or MOVEX.

I get the file from Andrea Leiser. Please also check the webshop questions. I think they would display these questions to the customer not just a field name.

Hi Urs,

we store also the values in hybris but we update them each login by reading them from SAP.
Estimation needed(if possible) - This is part of the sprint. Thanks!

@Neeraj

Can you please take this over from Nabil

Hello Neeraj
Until when are the new settings ready to test in the test shop?

Hi Urs,

This is done and ready for test, we have to wait until next deployment from branch v4.1 on Test env. I guess this is scheduled for today only.

@Neeraj

I guess we all forgot about the newsletter registration.

Can you please check the mail "Fwd: SEGMENTATION: Newsletter registration as per Oct 30th ", I've just sent to you.

Hello Rene Haemmerli | Distrelec :-

All the changes regarding this jira was reverted last moment , which I implemented last time. This was done align with David & Marc as they mentioned not to include in the last roll out. Based on that I can say nothing has been done so far as we are waiting for another specification on this task. Thanks

Hello Neeraj

The target is to have this on production by the 30.10.15.
So you can add this gain to the trunk.

Please also check the newsletter registration.
Hi Urs Bebie | Distrelec :- before I start implementation of this again, Please clarify me that above segmentation change is only for SAP countries. Thanks

Hi Nabil

This change is just related for the countries which are connected to NEW SAP.
I assigned the ticket to you because Neeraj is not here until we have to go live with this.

Values has to be maintained according to the final file "Kopie von ALL_DIS_M_roles_environment_definitions_ALE_20150723_FINAL"
The titles of the fields must be adjusted too.

This file includes the mapping of industry but the roles is missing.
as soon as I receive the file I'll send it too.

Hi Angel,

I made the implementation and it was deployed on the Q system. Please test it ASAP and send me back your feedback.

@Urs Bebie | Distrelec: could you please test the registration part with and without newsletter subscription.

@David Froidevaux | Distrelec: since we agreed to use the same values of departments and functions for both SAP and MOVEX countries, then could you please test the Movex part. Please test all scenarios including the already existing customers with department and function settings.

Thank you all for your feedbacks.

BR,
/Nabil.

Hi Nabil

The registration with and without Newsletter sub is working fine and also the titles in the registration are fine now. But I saw that if you go to the Account Details/Login Data the field names are still the old ones.

If a customer just subscribes for the newsletter and presses the button "Subscribe" at the end, then just a button "Back to Shop" is displayed. That is not so good in my opinion. I would expect as a customer to see something like "Thank you for subscribing our Newsletter, you will receive an mail to..... otherwise you do not know it the subscribtion was successful or not.
But this is something which could be fixed latter
Hi Urs Bebie | Distrelec, regarding the thank you page: The content differs between the Q and the Live system. When you do the same thing on the actual web shops such content is displayed.
Hi Marc, that's creat. Many thanks

The newsletter registration values are ok. Emails are also included in the test-list in optivo.
The new customer registration values are also ok, but when I go to my account and change the Function and Role, it sends the values empty to optivo... (screenshots attached)
Ruben Diaz Roman | Distrelec : could you please check this FE issue. Thanks.

Hi,
I tried to reproduce the issue and I found this in the log:

com.namics.distrelec.b2b.core.service.newsletter.model.DistNewsletterProfileExtModel@58b4b04b[
  email=distrelec.testing+ch_b2c@gmail.com
  titleCode=mr
  firstName=Nabil
  lastName=Benothman
  division=0020
  role=29
  segmentedTopic=true
  activeSubscription=<null>
]

which means that we send the new values to optivo.
Please test
Tested and working

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Done.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-8139] Credit card amount sent to Evo payment differs from SAP
item.description:
We placed an order from Webshop 1000111948 and the final value was 151,73.
In EvoPayments the amount that was sent was 151,72.

Based on the new setup that we have this creates serious issue as when SAP is trying to capture the amount Evo this is rejected as the amount sent from SAP differs and is higher. Capture is unsuccessful.
item.summary: Credit card amount sent to Evo payment differs from SAP

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: will debug it locally now.
fixed in v4.5.3, ready for Q deployment.

item.title: [DISTRELEC-8056] SE - PayPal "Unexpected Exception"
item.description:
"Unexpected Exception" is received when trying to continue to PayPal payment before you reach the paypal page.

user: distrelec.testing+se.b2b.deliveryblock@gmail.com

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: please test again
Hi Rene, still the same issue, attached new screenshot.
Paypal configuration is pending. Alain is informed to take care of it!

PayPal not yet working. see screenshot. error says: "Betalningen nekades på grund av följande fel:
Transaction refused because of an invalid argument. See additional error messages for details."

Paypal in SE is working now: oder: 1000223302

Problem was the Capture=Manual

item.title: [DISTRELEC-8017] Change text on NPS page LV
item.description:
Hi Ruben,

please replace text on LV NPS page:
https://www.elfadistrelec.lv/feedback/nps?email=peteris.sprogis%40elfa.se&fname=Peteris&namn=Sprogis&lang=%7Blanguage%7D&company=&order=%7Borderno%7D&cnumber=%7Bcustomerno%7D&contactnum=%7Bcontactnum%7D

From - Vai esat apmierināts ar Distrelec? Mūs interesē Jūsu viedoklis
To - Vai esat apmierināts ar Elfa Distrelec? Mums ir svarīgs Jūsu viedoklis

From - Kā Distrelec klients Jūs varat pamatoti gaidīt, ka saņemsiet izcilus pakalpojumus.
To - Kā Elfa Distrelec klients Jūs varat pamatoti gaidīt, ka saņemsiet izcilus pakalpojumus.

From – Send
To – Nosūtīt

Thanks a lot!

Best,
Laura
item.summary: Change text on NPS page LV

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Please test after the next deployment

One change that we discovered in Lithuania – this needs to be changed urgently.
In the text it says that 0 score is if you do not recommend, but 10 if you highly recommend.
Same time on the score scale – they are mixed up. 0 score if for highly recommend and 10 for do not recommend.

This needs to be fixed ASAP!
THX!
Changed

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7984] Change display availability for DE
item.description:
For the WEB shop Germany the availability should be displayed a bit different as today.

1. The delivery time for slow delivering warehouses should be displayed as 3 to 4 days instead of 10 days as today.

2. On the detail page of an item actually just the stock within 24 hours is displayed. That should be extended and the stock within 3 to 4 days should be displayed too.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment:
Hi Zisan
Could you check the ticket content and obtain the approval from sales Germany and Henrik, please?

Hi Urs,
i sent a information to Christian Lelonek about that and get the following answer :
.
Guten Morgen,
super, wenn wir damit die Streckenartikel wieder verkaufsfähig bekommen?
Die 10 Tage Lieferzeit sind sicherlich Blocker für die Kunden.
Bitte unbedingt sicherstellen, dass NUR die Streckenartikel in der Form angezeigt werden.
Keine virtuellen Bestände aus der Schweizer Kooperation mit lokalen Lieferanten in CH.
Das hatten wir vorher und es hat für einen negativen NPS gesorgt.
Gruß
Christian Lelonek
.
So yes the ticket content is ok for us. But please be aware that our customers shall not see the availability in the swiss warehouse (s)

Thank you!!
Hi René, as discussed the ticket about display the availability for Germany with the approval from Christian Lelonek.

1. The delivery time for slow delivering warehouses should be displayed as 3 to 4 days instead of 10 days as today.

Ok we can set slow delivery to 3 to 4 days.
Is this only for Germany or also for other countries?

2. On the detail page of an item actually just the stock within 24 hours is displayed. That should be extended and the stock within 3 to 4 days should be displayed too.
this will be done is ticket: DISTRELEC-7837

Hi René
This is only for Germany.

@Will

Please change slow delivery for Germany from "10 days" to "3 to 4 days"

@Zisan

Can you confirm that we will use the term "3 - 4 d" instead of "> 10 d" ?

Hi Rene,
yes i can confirm it. This is also approved from Christian Lelonek
But please be aware that our customers shall not see the availability in the swiss warehouse

Hallo Zisan

Das bedeutet dass ihr jetzt für Streckengeschäft "slow delivery" und für Streckengeschäft "fast delivery" das gleiche ("3 - 4 d") angeben wollt.

But please be aware that our customers shall not see the availability in the swiss warehouse

Das wurde bereits gemacht.

Hallo zusammen
Dies stimmt nicht ganz. Ich habe mit Nabil gesprochen, dass Bestand aus EF51 innerhalb von 24 h und ES51 innerhalb 3-4 Tage verfügbar ist.

Ich habe mit Nabil gesprochen

Bitte solche Diskussionen jeweils im Jira dokumentieren.

Also, dann machen wir jetzt für DE:

  • 7371 (CDC): 24 h
  • EF51: 24 h
  • ES51: 3-4 Tage
  • es werden keine weiteren Lager ausgewertet

So ist es jetzt auch in der Dokumentation:
http://wiki.distrelec.com/display/distrelint/ERP+Codelist+-+DistSalesOrg
Super. Besten Dank.
fixed are done in ticket: DISTRELEC-8106

Hi Nabil
The stock for ES51 is correctly displayed within 3-4 days on the item details but in the shopping card it is missing. It should be displayed there too. (see attached screen shots)

This is FE issue. From the BE, we receive exactly the same data on both product detail page and Cart Page.

@Ruben Diaz Roman | Distrelec: could you please check this issue. Thanks
Please test after the next deployment

Hi Ruben
Just made some tests in the German shop. If we have stock which is available within 3-4 days it looks fine but if there is no stock within 3-4 days it is displayed "undefined" instead of "3-4d 0" see print Screen "Shopping Card 2"
Please test after the deployment

item.title: [DISTRELEC-7195] SEM - Data - Access to Fact Finder export FTP
item.description:
Observations :

  • Search Marketing Team need feeds containing the products data mirroring the data live on the webplateform for Price Comparaison Plateform (Google Shopping, Toppreise...)
  • Operation Team is providing feeds containing SAP data to the Search Marketing Team.
  • Price / Availability / Brand blocking discrepancies are detected between SAP data and Front End Data.
  • SAP is not able to provide the front data expected in the feeds.

Impacts :

  • Price comparison platform refuse/blocks our feeds for data quality issues
  • This issue create major loss of traffic and revenue (up to 25% on 6 countries).

Demands :

  • In order to have the correct data inside the feeds we will use FactFinder data in junction with the current feeds :
    • Provide an FTP access to the FactFinder exports (from hybris),
    • Those feeds will be called by Products'up a Saas feed handler platform (the FTP must be accessible from outside).
  • If it's not possible, propose another solution.
item.summary: SEM - Data - Access to Fact Finder export FTP

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Really FTP again?

Similar to: DISTRELEC-6442 (SEO - Monitoring - Logs export to Botify via FTP)

  • please solve them together
We will setup a job on hp-p-app-0 to send the files to ftp.distrelec.com
added to the sprint 2015-08
@Rene : If the FTP access is an issue, I also can use direct url with passwords.

Much better!

So I could configure the apache web-servers to give you access over HTTP/S protocol with basic-auth, ok?
Yes, it's enough ! (and better if less work load ;] )
Could we do the same for Botify?
Unfortunately no, for botify we need to push to their FTP storage the log data. There is no alternatives solution for this one.
Disregard previous comment. Different Workstream.

@Rene : Any news about it ?
(or same issue as DISTRELEC-6442)
update ?

No no problem, since we don't use FTP.
I will do the apache configuration asap..

Hi Rene,
Any update on the apache configuration ?

http auth user: exportfeed01
pw: <via lync>
